title.narrative: Verdensmålenes Plads & student engagement project at Folkemødet på Bornholm 2021 (2030beyond)

description.narrative: The objective of Danida’s support to Verdensmålenes Plads at Folkemødet is to increase public knowledge and engagement in the Danish development cooperation and the SDGs with a special emphasis on engaging students - prior, during and after Folkemødet. An additional objective in the project is to strengthen Kenyan civil society’s engagement in democratic participation and sustainability. Public engagement in Danish development cooperation is founded in the Law on International Development Cooperation and highlighted in the Development Policy Strategy “The World we Share” from 2021.

title.narrative: The support to 2030beyond and 'Verdensmålenes Plads' at Folkemødet 2021 will lead to increased public knowledge and engagement in the Danish development cooperation and the SDGs amongst the physical and digital audiences at Folkemødet and young students. Moreover SDG pioneers from the Kenyan civil society both contribute to this at Verdensmålenes Plads and are inspired organize a similar event for democratic participation and sustainability in Kenya.

The support to 2030beyond and 'Verdensmålenes Plads' at Folkemødet 2021 will lead to increased public knowledge and engagement in the Danish development cooperation and the SDGs amongst the physical and digital audiences at Folkemødet and young students. Moreover SDG pioneers from the Kenyan civil society both contribute to this at Verdensmålenes Plads and are inspired organize a similar event for democratic participation and sustainability in Kenya.
